en.aiTravel: AI-powered travel planning tailored to your dreams
en.whereToGo: Where do you want to go?
en.discoverMostLoved: Discover the most loved travel spots
en.threeSimplesSteps: Three simple steps to your perfect journey
en.tellUsWhereYouWant: Tell us where you want to go, your budget, and travel dates
en.ourAiAnalyzes: Our AI analyzes your preferences and generates a personalized itinerary
en.downloadYourPlan: Download your plan and start exploring with confidence
en.ourAdvancedAi: Our advanced AI analyzes thousands of travel patterns to create the perfect itinerary for you. Get personalized recommendations based on your interests, budget, and travel style.
en.visualizeYourEntireJourney: Visualize your entire journey with integrated maps. Get turn-by-turn directions, estimated travel times, and discover points of interest along the way.
en.discoverHiddenGems: Discover hidden gems and must-see attractions tailored to your preferences. From accommodations to activities, every suggestion is handpicked for you.
en.noPlans: You don't have any saved travel plans yet.
en.allProvidersUnavailable: All AI providers are currently unavailable. Please try again later.
en.invalidResponse: AI service returned an unexpected response format.
en.configError: The application is not properly configured.
en.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
en.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
en.failedToGenerate: Failed to generate the plan. Please try again.
en.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
en.fillInDetails: Fill in the details below to generate a personalized AI itinerary.
en.whereYouWantToGo: Where do you want to go?
en.optionalAiSuggest: (optional - AI will suggest based on destination)
en.helpsFindBestFlights: Your starting location helps find the best flights, routes, or connections.
en.helpsAiSuggest: Helps AI suggest the best transport options, nearby airports, or ferry routes.
en.examplesPreferences: Examples: Include nightclubs and bars in evening activities | Vegetarian restaurants only | Focus on art museums and galleries | Wheelchair accessible locations
en.beSpecific: Be specific! Instead of "partying at night", write "Include nightclubs and late-night bars" for better results.
en.noPlanFound: No travel plan data was found. Please create a new plan.
